subject: Trades (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs re-signed the veteran forward Kurt Thomas, who was acquired in a trade in February. Terms were not disclosed. Thomas averaged 4.5 points and 4.9 rebounds in 28 games for the Spurs.
snippet: The San Antonio Spurs re-signed the veteran forward Kurt Thomas, who was acquired in a trade in February. Terms were not disclosed. Thomas averaged 4.5 points and 4.9 rebounds in 28 games for the Spurs.
